strings.SS2_ITEM_AUGURY_DESC: Upon recieving <style=cIsHealth>{0}%</style> of your <style=cIsHealth>maximum health</style> in <style=cIsHealth>damage</style>, unleash a devastating <color=#FFCCED>blackout</color>, <style=cIsDamage>instantly killing</style> all <style=cIsDamage>non-Boss enemies</style> caught in it.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SHACKLEDLAMP_PICKUP: Fire a haunted projectile every 5 primary uses.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SHACKLEDLAMP_DESC: Every <style=cIsDamage>5 primary uses</style>, fire a haunted projectile for <style=cIsDamage>200%</style> <style=cStack>(+200% per stack)</style> base damage.
strings.SS2_ITEM_SHACKLEDLAMP_LORE:
"Excuse me."

"Yes, over here, please. I need to ask you something."

"Closer, now."

"I need your help. This lantern you see before you, it is merely a fractured piece of a greater body."

"The journey? Ah, yes. It will be long, but do not fret. I will guide you wherever you must go, and, while it may be fraught with danger, it will be nothing I cannot assist you with."

"Hm? What's in it for you, you say?"

"Oh, you will see. Your reward will be far greater than you could possibly imagine. Once I have returned to my full splendor, I will protect you. I will keep you safe. Keep you warm. Make you powerful. All your worries will be burned away. Doesn't that sound wonderful?"

"You agree? Good. Now, pick up the lantern, quickly."

"We have a long journey ahead of us, friend."
strings.SS2_ITEM_STIRRINGSOUL_DESC: Slain monsters leave a <style=cIsUtility>soul</style> which has a <style=cIsUtility>{0}%</style> <style=cStack>(+{0}% per unsuccessful roll, resetting on success)</style> chance to <style=cIsUtility>spawn an item</style> on pickup.
strings.SS2_ITEM_STIRRINGSOUL_LORE:
A spirit of determination...
<link="textWavy">...A spirit to be stopped.</link>
An unwavering will to survive...
<link="textWavy">...A flickering will to survive.</link>

Willing to desecrate their identity...
<link="textWavy">...Willing to desecrate their memory.</link>
Willing to sacrifice their civilization...
<link="textWavy">...Willing to sacrifice their humanity.</link>

To what lengths will they go to live?
<link="textWavy">To what lengths will they go to bring themselves ruin?</link>
To what lengths will they go to escape?
<link="textWavy">To what lengths will they go to destroy?</link>

All in the name of self preservation...
<link="textWavy">...All in the name of narcissism.</link>
All for the sake of an uncertain hope...
<link="textWavy">...All for the sake of a null chance.</link>

What would happen if given an opportunity?
<link="textWavy">What would happen if given an ally?</link>
What would happen if their fire was stoked?
<link="textWavy">What would happen if they were given false hope?</link>

Maybe they should be given a chance.
<link="textWavy">Maybe they should be given strength.</link>
Maybe they should be given an offer.
<link="textWavy">Maybe they should be taken first.</link>
strings.SS2_ITEM_MOXIE_LORE: Hey! You! In this file! You probably shouldn't be here... Keep quiet, okay?
strings.SS2_ITEM_REMUNERATION_DESC: A <style=cIsUtility>choice</style> between three <style=cIsHealth>powerful items</style> appears closeby at the <style=cIsUtility>start of each stage</style>.
strings.SS2_ITEM_REMUNERATION_LORE:
<link="textShaky">What is your legacy?</link>



Nothing, but petty vengeance.



<link="textShaky">What is your identity?</link>



Nothing, but a name spoken in disgust.



<link="textShaky">What do you want?</link>



Nothing, but a new purpose.



<link="textShaky">What do you need?</link>



Nothing, but the weapons that I trust.



<link="textShaky">So, where will you go?</link>



Wherever you make me go.



<link="textShaky">Then, what will you do?</link>



Whatever you say you need.



<link="textShaky">Is that all, then?</link>



If you say it so.



<link="textShaky">Then go there, and die.</link>



...



As long as you're paying me.
